text:
MMOODDEELL | Lead Dev | Full-time | Berlin, GER | Onsite

We're looking for a lead dev to join our journey in disrupting the modeling industry. MMOODDEELL is an early stage marketplace to connect models/influencer/actors with clients of the creative industry.

Our product will be built from scratch so we're looking for someone who is comfortable in building a scalable foundation, an efficient core product and with a broad knowledge of technologies to lead the decision making.

For more info, email me: ludwig.henne@mmooddeell.com or check out the job description: http://mmooddeell.com/lead-developer/
